sentences.english: They are honey mooning in Paris.

sentences.chinese: 他們在威尼斯度了蜜月。

sentences.english: American honeymoon couples love their tropical beach honeymoons.
sentences.chinese: 美國新人比較喜歡熱帶海灘蜜月之旅。

sentences.english: I bought a black nightie to wear on her honeymoon.
sentences.chinese: 我買了一件黑色睡衣準備在蜜月時穿。

sentences.english: The bridal suite was prepared for the reception of the honeymooners.
sentences.chinese: 新婚套間已準備好以接待度蜜月的人。

sentences.english: The phrase "honey mo one" appeared in the mid-16th century.
The Dewanis, married for two weeks, were honeymooning in South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 德瓦尼夫婦，結婚了兩個星期，當時在南非度蜜月。

sentences.english: The couple honeymooned in Alfriston, in Sussex.
sentences.chinese: 這對兒情侶的蜜月去了蘇塞克斯郡的奧爾佛理斯頓。

sentences.english: We'll take Bonnie with us and we'll have another honeymoon.
sentences.chinese: 我們一起帶着寶尼來，我們再去度一次蜜月。

sentences.english: She quickly regretted the decision and locked him out of their honeymoon suite.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，簡很快反悔，並把自己鎖在了蜜月套房裏頭。

sentences.english: Record the newly-weds honeymoon trip tips and the equipment information.
sentences.chinese: 記錄新婚夫婦蜜月旅程的攻略和裝備信息。

sentences.english: The newly weds will honeymoon in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 那對新婚夫妻將到日本去度蜜月。

sentences.english: She bought a black nightie to wear on her honeymoon.
sentences.chinese: 她買了一件黑色睡衣準備在蜜月時穿。

sentences.english: After a year or two, the honeymoon naturally begins to wear off.
sentences.chinese: 一兩年之後，蜜月的甜蜜逐漸淡去。

sentences.english: He got married and began his honeymoon on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他結婚了並開始了他的海上蜜月旅行。

sentences.english: Finally the honeymoon suite is ready for action.
sentences.chinese: 最終，愛巢爲它們的蜜月做好了準備。

definition: to go on holidays/to spend one's vacation
to go on holidays/to spend one's vacation (Tw)
world with only two people (usually refers to a romantic couple)/romantic couple's world
to go on a tour/to have an outing
